sql-case.value: UPDATE t_order AS o SET o.status = %s WHERE o.order_id = %s AND o.user_id = %s
UPDATE t_order SET status = %s WHERE order_id = %s AND user_id = %s

UPDATE t_place SET start_time = %s, status = 0, start_point = ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||%s||' '||%s||')'), rule = %s::jsonb, discount_type = %s, order_type = %s WHERE user_new_id = %s AND guid = %s
